title: Phosboucraa Raises 2 Billion DH from CDG to Accelerate Its Industrial Development in the South
summary:
Phosboucraa, a subsidiary of the OCP Group, has secured 2 billion dirhams in financing from CDG to support its 23 billion dirham investment plan in Moroccoโs Southern Provinces. Structured by CDG Capital, the program aims to establish an integrated industrial and logistics hub by 2030 and to steer the mineโs transition toward a sustainable, locally impactful industrial model.
